title: Harvey Burnett
text:
Harvey "Harv" Burnett (born 18 August 1995) is a <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Scotland</a> international professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> and <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer who plays as a or for the <a href="Dewsbury%20Rams">Dewsbury Rams</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>. He is a <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Scotland</a> international.
Background.
Burnett was born in <a href="Kingston-upon-Thames">Kingston-upon-Thames</a>, <a href="Surrey">Surrey</a>, England.
Career.
Burnett started as a junior for the <a href="Elmbridge%20Eagles">Elmbridge Eagles</a>, and was in the <a href="London%20Broncos">London Broncos</a> Academy system.
He made his <a href="Scotland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Scotland</a> début in 2014 against <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a>.
In 2015 he made his <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> début for the <a href="London%20Broncos">Broncos</a> against the <a href="Leigh%20Centurions">Leigh Centurions</a>.
Burnett spent time on loan at the <a href="London%20Skolars">London Skolars</a> in 2015.
Midway through the 2015 season Burnett switched codes to play <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a>.
In 2016 Burnett returned to rugby league and joined <a href="Oxford%20Rugby%20League">Oxford</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">RFL League 1</a>.
in 2018 Burnett joined Bradford Bulls on a one-year contract.
